alert.note: Alert for Inland Worcester; Somerset (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 5:19AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Isolated thunderstorms will impact portions of Somerset and southwestern Worcester Counties through 615 AM EDT... At 519 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking isolated thunderstorms along a line extending from near Deal Island to 9 miles northwest of Tylerton. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Tylerton around 545 AM EDT. Westover around 550 AM EDT. Marion Station around 600 AM EDT. Lawsonia around 605 AM EDT. West Pocomoke around 610 AM EDT. Pocomoke City around 615 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Oriole, Byrdtown, Fairmount, Upper Hill, Smith Island, Hopewell, Rehobeth, Kingston, Saxis and Dames Quarter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
